snippet: Although the Court of Appeals will review Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s proposal, its fate will really be in the hands of the mayor’s successor.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's controversial attempt to limit size of sugary drinks in New York City is to be reviewed by New York State's Court of Appeals, offering final chance to salvage plan; fate of initiative will ultimately fall into the hands of mayor’s successor.
lead_paragraph: Although the Court of Appeals will review Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s proposal, its fate will really be in the hands of the mayor’s successor.

headline.main: New York Soda Ban to Go Before State’s Top Court
headline.print_headline: State’s Top Court to Review Limits on Big Sugary Drinks
